item.description:
Event: Enjoy over 25 miles of machine-groomed trails at the Windblown in New Ipswich NH, just an hour and half North of Boston. The Area has over 25 miles of machine-groomed trails for beginner, intermediate and expert skiing that includes a warming hut and a view of Mt. Monadnock. Windblown also has a rustic lodge with a fireplace to relax by and enjoy a hot cup of soup and some lunch after coming in. You may want to bring some liquid refreshments for out on the trails. Check Windblown's web site for directions, ski conditions, and more, www. windblownxc .com/
TC: Gary D Schwartz, mosaictrip6@averagebear.us
RSVP: Required by 9pm, Thursday the 25th. While Windblown is the first choice, TC may change location based on conditions so showing up there without contacting TC is not a great idea so email Gary at the the address above
Meet: Connect with Gary for the Plans and the Time at the address above.
Cost: $16 for XC trail pass / $13 for Snowshoe trails, $17 for ski & snowshoe rentals plus $5 for guests. Windblown may not accept credit cards so bring sufficient cash to cover trail passes, rentals, lessons and snacks.
item.how_to_find_us: Contact the Event's leader, Gary Schwartz for the details

group.name: Mosaic Jewish Outdoor Club of Massachusetts

item.name: CROSS COUNTRY SKI AND SNOW SHOE AT THE WINDBLOWN CENTER, NEW IPSWICH NH
